name: Floppy Fish (damoniano)
description:
A small project I worked on to learn the Godot Engine.

Not yet completely finished, though it is fully playable. Planned android implementation for eventual (free) release on the Google Play store.

Planned features include:

  • android support Google Play implementation
  • multiple color variations of the fish
  • new backgrounds and hazards
  • support for multiple resolutions

Background music from ozzed.net
